description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Oxford University Press. The average
  contract duration was 0.53 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $57.8K. The longest
  contract was 3.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $153.1K.
lookup_name: 'OXFORD UNIVERSITY PRESS'
